title: Project Lucian's exposed arm is weird.
body: Project Lucian only having one sleeve, leaving one of his arms exposed, seems...weird, in context on the line. I don't think any of the other Project skins have exposed skin.

replies.body: Look, he spent months in the gym to get those biceps, and by god he's going to show 'em off.
How else are you supposed to tell he's black?

> [{quoted}](name=Slamurai Jack,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AsETAQQL,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-20T20:55:45.602+0000)
>
> How else are you supposed to tell he's black?

They whitewashed one of his skins so I don't think that's much of a concern. xD

I think it looks pretty cool from a design standpoint.

> [{quoted}](name=Intronile,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AsETAQQL,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-08-20T20:56:46.407+0000)
>
> They whitewashed one of his skins so I don't think that's much of a concern. xD
> 
> I think it looks pretty cool from a design standpoint.

They didnt whitewash any of his skins.

They DID however make a reference to _The Spectre Brothers/The Twins_

http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Lucian_1.jpg

The skin's facial features, and skin tone aren't caucasian enough to be considered "white washed" anyway, not by a long shot.
I think they should have turned Lucians hair into cables,kinda feels like a missed opportunity.
So? All the rest are in entirely covering suits/cybernetic upgrades/whatever.

> [{quoted}](name=Hellioning,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AsETAQQL,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-08-20T21:06:26.038+0000)
>
> So? All the rest are in entirely covering suits/cybernetic upgrades/whatever.

Im not sure to what extend all of them are cybernetically augmented, but they are considered cyborgs non-the-less.
Doesn't yasuo show his face during one of his animations?
PROJECT: Yi takes off his mask as well as some of his armor when he ulted. so PROJECT: Lucian seems normal to me..
Normal as in bad as his other skins? xD
normal as in... its fine, since he's not the only one who shows bear skin? o-o;

It's the sole reason for me not buying Project Lucian. I love Lucian and I rly want a skin for him - But not Hired Gun Lucian, def not Striker Lucian and now it seems I have to skip his 3rd skin aswell.

Where is his armor on his arm? His arm with the white armor is soooo coooooool, who thought it was a good idea NOT to add it on the other? Symmetri is beautyful.... Cyborgs does not have a weight problem and extra protection is always a good thing.

Skins are a form of art, and I'm afraid Project Lucian got struck by the disease that is modern art....

EDIT: He looks like a black guy dressing up as a cyborg for halloween -.-
